WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 17 February 2024
Condition of Rain:
Showers can occur at several places in the sea areas off the coast extending from Pottuvil to
Galle via Hambantota.
Winds:
Winds will be north-easterly and wind speed will be (25-35) kmph.
Wind speed may increase up to (50-55) kmph at times in the sea areas off the coasts extending
from Galle to Pottuvil via Hambantota and from Colombo to Kankasanthurai via Puttalam.
